entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:16 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
